title: How do I remove "threads" and "grouping of conversations/emails"? I prefer the traditional simple viewing of emails without threads and/or grouping of conversations.
content: Pls kindly guide me on how to view my emails in the traditional view without "threads" and conversations/emails are shown according to date of receipt instead of "threads" or "grouping of conversations". Many thanks.
creator: alexwankh

title: App failed to start because itsside-by-side configuration is incorrect= see app  event log or usethe command- line sxstrace.exetool for more data
content: App failed to start because its side-by-side configuration is incorrect= see app event log or use the command- line sxstrace.exetool for more data
creator: coleen3

title: Firefox locks up
content: I cannot enter any text when I load firefox. The cursor just sits there blinking. Finally firefox unlocks and I can type. Like this questionaire I'm typing. I have been on this page for almost ten minutes trying to fill out this form. Now I can type something. If I stop, Firefox may lock up again. What is happening?
creator: charles.james1
